title: 'It's never too late': Savannah Guthrie's new plea for mother's release as FBI analyses glove
summary_full: The FBI says it recovered a DNA sample from the glove, which was found in a field a few miles from Guthrie's home.
summary_public: The FBI says it recovered a DNA sample from the glove, which was found in a field a few miles from Guthrie's home.
